author: Brian Turner
method: Place all the ingredients, except the chives into a saucepan and cook for 15 minutes or until cooked through.  Add the chives and serve.
ingredients: ¼ potato, diced,  ¼ leek, sliced,  1 tbsp butter,  150ml/5fl oz milk,  150ml/5fl oz double cream,  handful of fresh chives, chopped
